name: Scrappy Summer Quilt Pattern
description:
This quilt pattern is a more detailed version of a tutorial on my blog.  The pattern includes full material requirements, whether you want to make the quilt from scraps or from yardage, as well as color options if you want all of the small chain squares to be the same color/fabric (see the third photo).

4 sizes are included:  Crib (40 x 48), Throw (56 x 64), Picnic (64 x 80) and Twin ( 64 x 88).  

This is a 6 page PDF only pattern.  The pattern will be emailed instantly to the email associated with your Paypal account.  If you don't get it instantly...please let me know and I'll send it!

name: To the Point #141, PDF Pattern
description:
This pattern uses fun and simple piecing methods to make these triangles without templates.  It comes with 3 sizes, and is layer cake, fat quarter, or scraps friendly.  I recommend this pattern for advanced beginners.  I also recommend starching fabrics before cutting (I like the Best Press starch)  to prevent stretching during sewing and cutting. 

See the 2nd photo for sizes and material requirements.  The crib size does not have borders. 

**Paper patterns will be mailed within 2 days via first class mail. PDF patterns are instantly emailed to the email associated with your Paypal account or entered upon checkout.

name: Ziggy Baby Pattern #120, PDF Pattern
description:
These playful quilts are quick, easy, and perfect for any boy or girl.  The zig-zag quilt is perfect for wrapping up baby, while the steps quilt is just the right size for tucking in your toddler. 

Material Requirements and sizes:

Zig-Zag Quilt:      32” x 40”

•  Five assorted strips 5” x 40” of colored fabrics (one for each
   of the zig-zags)  or 5 fat quarters.
   *For a scrappy look like the cover quilt, you’ll need 8 assorted
    5” x 5”  squares for each of the 5 zig zags. (40 total)
•  3/4 yard white fabric
•  3/8 yard binding fabric
•  1 1/2 yard backing fabric
•  batting



Steps Quilt:      48” x 54”  Crib / Toddler Size

•  4 assorted 1/2 yards of different colored fabrics
•  5/8 yard white fabric
•  1/2 yard binding fabric
•  3 yards backing fabric
•  batting

---------------------------------------

PDF Patterns will be emailed instantly to the email associated with your Paypal account or the email you enter during checkout.

Paper patterns will be sent USPS first class within 1-2 days.

This pattern is ideal for a beginner.

name: Basket Case, Pattern #116, PDF Pattern
description:
Basket Case is a trick for the eye with strips that seam to weave in and out of each other.  It is all machine pieced from just one jelly roll, cream fabric, and border fabrics.  The simple cutting and piecing instructions minimize lots of pesky visible seams and will have your friends wondering how you did it. 

Finished Quilt is 61" x 71" with borders or 48" x 58" without borders.

Each block uses 1 jelly roll strip and 9 neutral 2 1/2" squares, so it is easy to make different sizes!

Fabric Requirements:

1 Jelly Roll
1-1/4 yard cream fabric
1/2 yard for inner border
1 yard for outer border
use leftover jelly roll strips for a scrappy binding or 1/2 yard

Pattern is suitable for beginners with good piecing/seam matching skills.

Cover quilt is made with Bliss by Bonnie and Camille for Moda
---------------------------------------

PDF Patterns will be emailed instantly to the email associated with your Paypal account or the email you enter during checkout.

Paper patterns will be sent USPS first class within 1-2 days.

Measures 49" x 57"  crib/toddler bed size




Pattern will be mailed the next business day.

name: Spring Fling Baby Quilt, PDF Tutorial
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This baby quilt pattern is the perfect combo of modern and traditional for any new baby. The 29 page PDF pattern is written for a beginning quilter, but includes a table of contents so even a intermediate sewer can skip ahead. Also included at the end of the pattern is instructions for re-sizing this pattern to make a Toddler Bed Quilt. Finished baby quilt size is 37" x 48".

Also included are detailed instructions for finishing your quilt.

PDF Patterns will be emailed instantly to the address associated with your Paypal account or entered during checkout.

----------------------------------------------------

This festive quilt & runner will add holiday spirit to 
  any space and be enjoyed for many years to come. 

Quilt measures 45" x 45" 
Table Runner measures 16" x 45" 
2 Hot pads measures approx.. 9" square

Pattern is intended for someone with beginning to intermediate sewing skills.

name: Swirly Pop Quilt Pattern #114, PDF Pattern
description:
Swirly Pop reminds me of candy, and will add a touch of sweetness to any room.  It's easy enough for a beginner, sews up fast, and is charm pack friendly. 


Finished Size:  60" x 68" with border
                       47" x 55" without borders

name: Daisy Gate Quilt Pattern #121, PDF pattern
description:
Finished Size: 46 1/2” x 51”   Crib Size

Simple piecing and fun applique makeup this sweet and easy crib quilt.  Pattern is perfect for a beginner.

Material Requirements:

•  3/4 yard blue fabric for the "sky"
•  3/4 yard floral print for the background
•  1 yard neutral fabric for the "fence"
•  2 contrasting fat quarters for the flower petals
•  1 fat quarter or 2 - 6" squares for the flower centers
•  3 yards backing fabric
•  1/2 yard binding fabric
•  Lightweight fusible web
•  Batting


PDF Patterns will be emailed instantly to the address associated with your Paypal account or entered during checkout.
